resources.string: This is FirstFragment. You can see a simple basic usage of Navigation between IntroFragment and FirstFragment
Now Let\'s try to pass an argument. Type something and we will pass it to the next screen
This is SecondFragment. Here we are receiving an argument from FirstFragment, so you can see an example of Navigation with arguments, using SafeArgs
Ok now let\'s see an animation, Shared Element Transition between this image and the next screen. Click on Next and see what happen
